reviewtext: *  It is indeed plug and play...I just plugged it into the USB on my Lenovo laptop (Windows 7).  I was able to view every file on numerous floppy disks.*  Great price.  If you have some old, old floppies around, I recommend getting this little beauty.  You might have some wonderful old files/memories you had forgotten about on those floppies.
summary: Just the ticket to retrieve files from those old floppy disks
